amendment.description: To provide valuation of employee personal use of noncommercial aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2658 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2658 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S13134; text: CR S13134) To provide valuation of employee personal use of noncommercial aircraft.
